S02manivdhu:1_1: 1 yitavyāḥ // dvātṛṃśati śarāvā pūrayitavyāḥ // catvāri tailāni catvāri ghṛtaṃ / catvāri
S02manivdhu:1_2: 2 guḍapiṇḍāni / catvāri tilapūrṇāni / catvāry aṭhalapūrṇaṃ / catvāri saptavījakapūrṇaṃ
S02manivdhu:1_4: 4 ghṛtagarjakaṃ guḍapūpaṃ sarvasukṛtakāryāṇi yathā lābhaṃ saṃjñātavyaṃ
S02manivdhu:1_5: 5 maṇḍalakaṃ suracitaṃ kṛtvā tato praveśadvāreṇa gatvodakapūrṇaṃ dvau kalaśausthāpya
S02manivdhu:2_1: 1 tathā lābhaṃ ca baliṃ sthāpya tathāvat praveśavidhiṃ ca kārayet tataḥ anena mantreṇābhiṣiṃcya
S02manivdhu:2_2: 2 praveśayet* oṃ maṇi vipula supratiṣṭhita siddha abhiṣiṃca māṃ sarvatathāgatābhiṣekai
S02manivdhu:2_3: 3 bhara bhara saṃbhara hūṃ hūṃ // yathābhiṣiktamātraś ca sarvāṇi nivaraṇāni
S02manivdhu:2_4: 4 pūrvajanmasaṃjātāni karmāvaraṇāni vuśuddhāni bhavanti bhavanti sarvaśuddhaparigṛhito bhavati :
S02manivdhu:3_1: 1 sarvasiddhiś cābhyāmukhībhavati / yaṃ cintayati yaṃ prārthayati tat tathaiva karoti //
S02manivdhu:4_1: 1 athāto mudrālakṣaṇaṃ vakṣye / catvāri mahāhṛdayamudrāṇi prayojyā sarvatathāgataiḥ
S02manivdhu:4_2: 2 kulasāmānyaṃ prayojayet* // catvāry āryavajrahṛdayamudrāṇi upayojyā sarvamaṇḍalaiḥ //
S02manivdhu:4_4: 4 mudrā upayojyā yathāvidhi // bāhyamudrā na grahetavyā : anyamudrā yathā
S02manivdhu:4_5: 5 sukhaṃ sarvatra upayoktavyaḥ yathā upayujyate tathāgatakule // oṃ sarvatathāgatahṛdaya
S02manivdhu:5_1: 1 maṇijvālani āreṣṭaya hūṃ // tathāgatahṛdayamudrā : // oṃ sarvatathāgata
S02manivdhu:5_2: 2 pravarāgramaṇi hūṃ // tathāgatasamayamudrā : // oṃ sarvatathāgatābhisaṃbodhanavajre 3 hūṃ hūṃ /
S02manivdhu:5_3: 4 maṇi maṇi hūṃ hūṃ phat* // tathāgatādhiṣṭhānamudrā // oṃ sarvatathāgata pravara maṇi
S02manivdhu:5_4: 5 rucire hūṃ hūṃ phat* // tathāgatavajrasiṃhāsanamudrā // oṃ sarvatathāgata vipula saṃbhave
S02manivdhu:6_1: 1 hūṃ hūṃ // tathāgatābhiṣekamudrā // oṃ sarvatathāgata samaya maṇi vajre hūṃ hūṃ //
S02manivdhu:6_2: 2 dharmacakramudrā : // oṃ sarvatathāgata jaya ajitavajre hūṃ hūṃ /
S02manivdhu:6_4: 3 mahāmaṇi śikhare hara hara hūṃ hūṃ // tathāgatacakravartimudrā : //
S02manivdhu:6_5: 4 oṃ sarvatathāgata vajrā hvaya ddhara dhara hūṃ hūṃ phat* // āryavajramaṇigrahaṇamudrā : /
S02manivdhu:6_6: 5 oṃ dhuru dhuru maṇi mahāvidyuta maṇi svāhā // cintāmaṇimudrā āryavajrasya mudrā // oṃ lokapālite
S02manivdhu:7_1: 1 jaya jaya hūṃ hūṃ // caturmahārājānāṃ mudrā grahetavyā : // oṃ vipulā gravati
S02manivdhu:7_2: 2 saṃbhara hūṃ // śriyā mahādevyā mudrā grahetavyā // oṃ daṃṣṭriṇi visara hūṃ // tarjanīmudrā
S02manivdhu:7_3: 3 śaṃkhinī // oṃ āgamaya dhīra mucāṭṭa hāsinī hūṃ dūtīmudrā baddhitavyā : // oṃ samantākāra
S02manivdhu:7_4: 4 paripūraṇe dhaka dhaka hūṃ hūṃ phat* maṇḍalanivāsinīnāṃ mudrā : // ābāhanamudrā
S02manivdhu:7_5: 5 grahetavyā : // oṃ sara sara visara hūṃ hūṃ padmamudrā /
S02manivdhu:8_1: 1 athāta paṭalavidhānaṃ vakṣye sarvakāryeṣu sādhakaṃ / paṭe acchinnadaśake keśāpagate
S02manivdhu:8_2: 2 ekahastaṃ dvihastaṃ vā samantena caturaśrakaṃ poṣadhikena citrakareṇa
S02manivdhu:8_3: 3 navabhājane na śleṣai raṃgair buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ citrāpayitavyam siṃhāsanasyopariniṣaṇṇaṃ
S02manivdhu:8_5: 5 dakṣiṇena vajrapāṇiṃ dvādaśabhujaṃ kāryā śaratkāṇḍagaurā nānāpraharaṇahastaṃ caturmukhaṃ saumyaṃ dvitīlavistaraḥ /
S02manivdhu:9_1: 1 athāta paṭalavidhānaṃ vakṣye sarvakāryeṣu sādhakaṃ / paṭe acchinnadaśake
S02manivdhu:9_2: 2 keśāpagate ekahastaṃ dvihastaṃ vā samantena caturaśrakaṃ poṣadhikena citrakareṇa
S02manivdhu:9_3: 3 navabhājanena aśleṣai raṃgair buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ citrāpayitavyaṃ siṃhāsanasyopariniṣaṇṇaṃ
S02manivdhu:9_5: 5 dvādaśabhujāṃ kāryā śaratkāṇḍagaurā nānāpraharaṇahastaṃ caturmukhaṃ saumyaṃ / dvitīyaṃ
S02manivdhu:10_1: 1 raudraṃ tṛtīyaṃ daṃṣṭrākarālaṃ caturthe mukhe bhṛkuṭījaṭāmakuṭāmaṇḍitaṃ sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitaṃ
S02manivdhu:10_2: 2 padmasyopariniṣaṇṇaṃ ardhaṃ paryaṃkayā // bāmapārśve maṇivajro nāma bodhisatvo
S02manivdhu:10_3: 3 kartavyaḥ caturmukhaṃ ṣoḍaśabāhuṃ // dakṣiṇabāhūṃ cintāmaṇiddhārayaṃ tathāgatasyopanāmayati //
S02manivdhu:10_4: 4 bāmabāhūṃ padmaddhārayantaḥ dve haste aṃjaliṃ gṛhītavyaṃ : // śeṣaṃ
S02manivdhu:10_5: 5 prahastaṃ kartavyaṃ tṛśūlaṃ cakraṃ khadgaṃ vajraṃ puṣpapuṭaṃ gaṇendakakaṇḍulaṃ aṣiḥ pu
